artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Published by Jōshūya Kinzō
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Shitō no tsuyu no soko ni noko n no hana no iro/ Suichiku no kemuri no naka ni kure no tori no koe (Dew forms on the flowers of purple wisteria. The color of flowers remains in the dew./ Mist settles in the green bamboo forest. The voice of evening birds echoes in the mist.)
Minamoto no Shōki (poet\'s name, not written on the print, the poet\'s bio unknown)

from Wakanrōeishū vol. 1, Spring

Dr. N. Hayashi Oct. 2007
markings: Tōkaidō 極 seal; Censor: Kiwame 極; publisher\'s seal: Jōkin
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Swallows and Wisteria
